title.rendered: Epic Boosts Brand Awareness to Compete for Diverse Tech Talent

content.rendered: Handshake_Epic_CaseStudy

excerpt.rendered: With an expanded network and digital toolset, Epic beats the competition. They now source a quarter of all early talent hires on Handshake.
